name: Rox
overview: ROX is a hidden game within the Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge game. It is activated by entering player one’s name as “MONSTER” and player two’s name as “SEVENTEEN”. The hidden game only works on versions of LOTUS 1 where the game information screen is shown after pressing fire to start it. It was also published as a standalone game on the Coverdisk #4 of Amiga Action Magazine issue 18 (Mar 1991).
